parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.62

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Positioning

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns grid size based on screen resolution.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''pixelGridBase'''

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Number]] - Grid size, see [[Arma 3: Pixel Grid System]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_gridBaseHeight = [[pixelH]] * [[pixelGridBase]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[pixelGrid]], [[pixelGridNoUIScale]], [[pixelH]], [[pixelW]], [[Pixel Grid System]]
</value></part></template></root>
